meanings.definition: A piece of written, printed, or electronic matter that provides information or evidence.
meanings.sent1: I need to bring my identification document to the appointment.
meanings.sent2: The teacher handed out a document with all the assignment details.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a mysterious document hidden in the old book.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a secret document, revealing her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map was a document of adventure waiting to be explored.

meanings.sent1: I will document all the important steps in the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The historian wanted to document the ancient ruins before they deteriorated further.
meanings.sent3: He decided to document his daily routine in a journal for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her photographs beautifully document the changing seasons in the park.
meanings.sent5: The filmmaker aimed to document the struggles of the local community through his documentary.
